Title: 🇸🇴The constitutional crisis in Somalia continues: the authoriti...
Description: 🇸🇴The constitutional crisis in Somalia continues: the authorities of autonomous Jubaland also opposed the federal government. On March 30, the parliament in Mogadishu approved amendments to the constitution. According to them, the country is making a transition from a parliamentary form of government to a presidential one, a five-year term of office is being introduced for government bodies, and direct elections were also introduced at the national and regional levels.▪️The last point was ignored by the Jubaland authorities who, in an effort to consolidate their leadership, did not dare to undertake electoral reform. Bypassing the federal government, the upcoming elections for the head of Jubaland will be held on the basis of indirect voting. The demarche was soon followed by a severance of ties with the Somalis. Until a compromise is found, the state will be governed by local structures.▪️In Mogadishu, this act was called -regressive,- which was followed by an appeal to the contingent of the African Union mission to occupy the airport of Kismayo, the capital of the autonomy. This order was followed after the Prime Minister of Somalia plans to visit Jubaland in order to personally draw a federal line. Only the allies said that they cannot occupy the airport, because it is under the jurisdiction of local authorities. Now the Ethiopian authorities are supplying the autonomous regions and trying to gain as much influence over them as possible, including occupying some key positions in cities. They are also unhappy that Egypt will be the main guarantor of security in the new Somali mission. In this situation, it is obvious that the Ethiopians will continue to rock the situation, putting pressure on Mogadishu through their puppets in the form of the autonomous regions of Jubaland and Puntland.#Africa #Somalia @rybarSupport usHiiraanJubbaland suspends cooperation with federal government, citing constitutional violations Kismayo (HOL) – Jubbaland Regional State administration suspended cooperation with the federal government, citing federal non-compliance with Somalia's constitution and disrespecting Jubbaland's autonomy.

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇵🇸 On the appointment of a new US Ambassador to Isra...
Description: 🇮🇱🇺🇸🇵🇸 On the appointment of a new US Ambassador to Israel Yesterday, US President-elect Donald Trump announced the appointment of Republican Mike Huckabee, a former governor of Arkansas, known for his openly pro-Israel views, to the post of American Ambassador to the State of Israel. ▪️Against the background of this, Huckabee’s old interview with the Israeli media and the country’s army radio surfaced on the Internet, where he stated that there is no West Bank. According to him, in reality there is a region - Judea and Samaria - which - was given to Israel by God -. ▪️ Another thesis of the former Arkansas governor caused a certain resonance: he allowed Israel to annex the territory of the West Bank and expand Jewish settlements there, which he, contrary to UN Security Council Resolution 2334, he does not consider them illegal.▪️As ​​expected, with the election of Trump, quite favorable conditions are being formed for the ultra-Orthodox authorities of Israel. Radical politicians like Itamar Ben-Gvir and Bezalel Smotrich have long been talking about the need to return Israeli sovereignty to the West Bank. Now they will be able to realize this opportunity. It is worth noting the current US Ambassador to Israel, Democrat Jacob Joseph Lew: he did not distinguish himself with such harsh statements and spoke only about the need to conclude a deal between the Israeli side and the Palestinian groups for the exchange of hostages.❗However, the fact of the appointment of a loyal Israeli ultra-Orthodox ambassador does not mean at all that the policy of the elected US president will be as pro-Israel.🔻Most likely, if Israel implements the plan of annexation of the occupied territories of the Palestinian National Authority, there will be significant resistance (if any) from local authorities in the form of the ruling Fatah party and its intelligence services will not be able to provide. At the same time, from a military point of view, the West Bank is much inferior to the Gaza Strip, where Hamas and its allies held control and which Israeli troops were able to raze to the ground. Even taking into account the existence of contacts between the Palestinian Authority and Arab countries, they will limit themselves, at best, to condemning the actions of the Israelis.▪️The chairman of the autonomy, Mahmoud Abbas, has long been considered a kind of Gauleiter of Israel: instead of repelling the constantly invading Israeli forces, the PNA security services do not hinder them in any way and even facilitate them by fighting with cells of Hamas and other groups.▪️The same applies to the armed factions -Palestinian resistance-. Yes, there will be pockets of discontent and escalation of the conflict, but it is unlikely that this will develop into an acute phase of confrontation, much less stop the Israeli government. Taking all this into account, Israel will be able to relatively quickly digest the West Bank, reducing it to a state pressed against the Dead Sea or the Jordan River a small Palestinian enclave.📌 Well, the ultra-Orthodox Israeli government will be able to begin implementing such a plan whenever there is a need for a new armed conflict, the presence of which would help the ruling coalition led by Benjamin Netanyahu justify its presence in power.#Israel #USA #Palestine@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇹🇩About the operation -Haskanit- in the area of ​​Lake Chad ...
Description: 🇹🇩About the operation -Haskanit- in the Lake Chad region. The operation of the Chadian armed forces -Haskanit-, carried out since the beginning of November, despite the unfounded accusations of the West of killing civilians, is yielding results.▪️Chad's General Staff announced the liquidation of 96 Boko Haram militants and the death 17 military personnel during the cleanup. The marshy terrain with a huge number of small islands, of course, complicates the process, which is why the fighting will continue for a long time. It is noteworthy that following the announcement of the start of the operation, the question was raised about Chad’s withdrawal from the Joint Special Forces (MNJTF), which, in addition to it includes Nigeria, Benin and Cameroon.▪️The government argues for this by the general ineffectiveness of the organization, which is why it has failed to ensure security in the Lake Chad region. And now the Chadian authorities are dealing with this issue themselves. One can understand this position - it is worth remembering only the recent news from Nigeria, where almost every month some new group raises its head. At the same time, the armed forces, which were reformed by American advisers, cannot cope with this. For Debi the Younger, this is a successful political move and in many ways reminds the Chadian public of his father. At one time, Idriss Deby also led successful military campaigns against various militants, finding support in society. High-resolution map English version#Africa #map #Chad@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇹🇷🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the wo...
Description: 🌍🇹🇷🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the world: Africa And the last on our list is Africa. The region because of which the French began their investigation, since it directly affects the interests of the Fifth Republic. 15 countries on the continent already have drones or agreements for their supply. And there are so many states that have considered or are considering purchasing Turkish drones that it is easier to count those countries that have not done so. If you look at the presented map, everything becomes obvious without words. Turkish drones, due to their low cost relative to Western UAVs, as well as a wide range of options both in the choice of drones themselves and on-board weapons, have become an ideal option for African countries. To perform basic tasks patrolling or fighting terrorists, that is, to counter an enemy without air defense systems, UAVs of Turkish companies are formidable weapons. Why during the air defense Have the Bayraktars become useless? Our troops adjusted their tactics and sent short-range air defense systems to cover the units, which made it possible to destroy more than a dozen of these UAVs.🔻Now in the Northern Military District of the Ukrainian Armed Forces they are used only for reconnaissance and guidance thanks to the installed Canadian cameras, which provide high detail even from long distances. But in Africa, the same Bayraktars are a powerful argument in the fight against terrorism. The Turks, taking advantage of the moment, advertised their UAVs and occupied this niche in many regions, since the countries of Africa or Asia could not afford to buy multimillion-dollar MQ-1s, not not to mention larger models like the MQ-9. Therefore, the fears of the French are quite justified, as their expansion continues. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #UAV #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌏🇹🇷🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the wo...
Description: 🌏🇹🇷🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the world: Middle East and Asia The Middle East and Asia are two more regions on our list where Turkish UAVs are becoming widespread. Moreover, unlike Europe, cooperation here proceeds mainly through localization of production, which expands the geography of Turkish presence. In the Middle East, Turkish drones were purchased by Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Qatar, Kuwait and Iraq. The Saudis chose -Akinci- from Baykar, as well as Karayel from Vestel, which were not included in this infographic, since they are only available in Saudi Arabia. The UAE, according to some reports, purchased more than a hundred -Bayraktars-, but integrated them high-precision weapons of its own production. Iraq, Kuwait and Qatar have also purchased the most popular drones. Their price and capabilities in the context of tasks of combating militants and routine patrols are ideal for the countries of the region. In Central Asia, the Turks went further, gradually expanding the number of their enterprises in the countries of the region. The localization of two enterprises at once - TAI and Baykar - has already been agreed upon in Kazakhstan, where there is an Anka UAV. Three types of drones were purchased by Kyrgyzstan, and Bayraktars were purchased in Turkmenistan. For the Turkish authorities, technological expansion has become an ideal opportunity to increase efforts through the Organization of Turkic States, which aims to expand its strength in various fields, including the military. The lack of an alternative creates excellent conditions for them to do this.🔻In South Asia, Turkish products are represented in Pakistan, one of Turkey’s key partners. They purchased both -Bayraktary- and -Akyndzhi-. Also, 24 Bayraktar UAVs were purchased by the authorities of Bangladesh, and the Maldives entered into a contract for the supply of six drones of this type. In Southeast Asia, TAI won, since there they were able to sell 12 Anka drones to the Indonesian authorities and three to the Malaysian authorities. In addition, the Japanese authorities expressed interest in purchasing Turkish products, but things have not gone further than talk. High resolution mapEnglish version#Asia #UAV #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇹🇷🇪🇺🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the ...
Description: 🇹🇷🇪🇺🛸 About the expansion of Turkish UAV products in the world: Europe Last week, one French agency, positioning itself as a think-tank organization, published an article alarming for the French about how widely Turkish drones have spread in the world and most importantly for the French - in Africa. The French focused on the fact that the Turks offer much cheaper products, than the French, thereby occupying the niche that previously belonged to Western corporations in different regions of the world. And this makes them anxious.🔻From a logical point of view, analysts’ concerns are understandable, since Turkish unmanned products have indeed made several big steps. This was first facilitated by the Second Karabakh War, and then two months of the Northern Military District, when the Turks promoted Bayraktars from under every iron. In almost every region of the world, some countries are either already cooperating with Turkish companies, or are planning, or there were unconfirmed rumors about this . The first region in our review is Europe. Thanks to the SVO, Baykar drones became known to the general public. Despite the fact that during the conflict in the so-called Ukraine - Bayraktars - became useless after March 2022, competent PR gave the necessary impetus to the Turkish enterprise, because of which the Turks entered into dozens of contracts for supplies of these UAVs. In addition to the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Bayraktar were purchased by Romanians, Poles, Albanians and Kosovars. One was acquired by the Lithuanians for Ukrainian formations. The Romanians, for example, have already received the first batch, for which a separate unit was created. And in Kosovo, these UAVs play a vital role in monitoring Serbian units. On Ukrainian territory, somewhere in the vicinity of Kyiv, the Baykar plant has almost been completed, where they plan to assemble Bayraktar drones of modifications TB2 and TB3 - the latest deck-based drones that equip Turkish universal landing forces ships. Title: 🎬🖼 🇬🇪 Another protests are currently taking place in Georgia....
Description: 🇬🇪 Another protests are currently taking place in Georgia. But this time the opposition brought up the -heavy artillery-, sending several dozen women to go on strike near the building of the central election committee. Participants in the rally said that they want to register their complaints with the Central Election Commission because of the violations they recorded during the elections, such as falsification of ballots, and demand holding new elections. Several police detachments are on duty at the building, preventing demonstrators from entering. In general, the situation is calm, although the opposition media are trying to disperse thesis about a violent clash between women and the police. 🔻The decline in protest activity occurred even faster than expected. The last relatively large rally occurred on November 11 due to the presence of European officials at the demonstration. Both yesterday and today, the opposition is silent. Even activist Greta Thunberg, who came to help the Georgians, left the country and went to Armenia. She was met at the Armenian-Georgian border by pro-government journalists, who joyfully reported on Thunberg’s visit as part of the boycott of COP29 in Baku. In this whole situation, the conclusion is simple - the opposition in Georgia no longer hopes for anything, they have neither plans nor any competent strategies. Protest activity is still present, but following the example of Armenia, it will soon move into the stage of -rallies on weekends-, and then only on holidays-. #Georgia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇦🇿 About the Armenian-Azerbaijani agenda against the backdr...
Description: 🇦🇲🇦🇿 About the Armenian-Azerbaijani agenda against the background of the UN conference in Baku On Monday, the UN climate conference COP29 started in Baku, which will last until November 22. For a long time, the event was associated with the potential signing of a peace treaty between Armenia and Azerbaijan on its margins. In recent weeks, the possibility of the Armenian side using the podium of the event to demand the release of prisoners of war, including the military-political leadership of Artsakh, has also been discussed. However, the Armenian authorities have not yet announced an official position regarding participation in the conference. Instead, the head of the Armenian Foreign Ministry Ararat Mirzoyan went to Sweden for one-on-one negotiations with local authorities. All this is another diplomatic failure of Yerevan, because silence allows the Azerbaijani side to completely control the information agenda. But the latter is not particularly resisted in Yerevan, especially the more ruling party, the Civil Contract, during the start of COP29, thwarted the adoption by parliament of the opposition statement on Armenian prisoners of war in Azerbaijan. This once again suggests that the government of Nikol Pashinyan is not interested in publicly defending the interests of Armenia, including the protection of Armenians in Azerbaijani prisons, which represent for the authorities the surrender of Artsakh and defeat in the war. 📌As we previously wrote, Armenia is moving into the shadow of world and regional diplomacy, which indicates a loss of sovereignty and the ability to defend its interests. Moreover, this is happening voluntarily, not forced, and with the active support of the United States and the EU, which are pushing Armenia towards a pro-Turkish vector of development. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #UN@rybarSupport us NEWS.am Baku called Armenia's non-participation in COP 29 a missed opportunity. To ensure the inclusivity of COP29, Azerbaijan sent invitations to both the member parties of the Convention and Armenia. As APA reports, Azerbaijani Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov told reporters.

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 13, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of November 13, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues to advance in the area of ​​the settlement with heavy fighting. Novoivanovka, pushing through the dense enemy defenses and repelling numerous counterattacks by elite units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. An attempt by units of the 17th brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to break through the encirclement in the Olgovsky forest area was thwarted. Artillery strikes and FPV drones destroyed up to 30 enemy soldiers, 2 infantry fighting vehicles and 1 armored personnel carrier, and no breakthrough was allowed. There are reports of successes near Daryino. The Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from most of Plekhovo. The command of the Ukrainian Armed Forces is increasing its force in the border zone. Combined strikes by the OTRK and Tordano-S destroyed large concentrations of Ukrainian Armed Forces reserves in the area of ​​the settlement. Yunakovka, Yablunevka and Sudzha. Our group of troops estimates the enemy's losses from these attacks to be more than 200 people, Krotal air defense systems, 13 armored fighting vehicles and 28 vehicles. ▪️ By nightfall, the Bryansk region repelled an enemy UAV raid. The governor reported 13 aircraft-type UAVs. Another 5 were destroyed in the morning. Smaller drones attacked the village of Voronok in the Starodubsky municipal district (a woman was wounded), the village of Khinel in the Sevsky district, the Klimovsky district (a woman was wounded). The artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine was working in the area near Suzemka.▪️ North of the Kurakhovsky reservoir, the clearing of the liberated part of Ilyinka is underway. Novoselidivka taken. Fierce fighting is taking place on the eastern outskirts of Kurakhovo. To the south, the Russian Army took most of Dalny, which practically cuts the route from Kurakhovo to the south, and creates critical conditions for the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the villages along the river. Dry Yaly. They write about heavy fighting in Elizavetovka and the previously occupied part of Antonovka. ▪️ The eastern part of the Vremevsky direction has begun to move, there are heavy battles near the settlement. Rivnopol and Novodarovka, the footage captured a confrontation between an attack helicopter of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and our FPV drone, which was trying to shoot down an enemy rotorcraft. ▪️ Enemy intelligence reports publicly about the preparation of an offensive by our troops on the Zaporozhye front. ▪️ In the Belgorod region at night, the city of Shebekino and the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, were attacked by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. During the day, the village was attacked by drones. New, Plotvyanka village, village Repyakhovka ▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, six people were injured by gunfire from the Armed Forces of Ukraine using cluster-type shells: women born in 1947, 1966, 1968. and men born in 1953, 1955, 1994. In Ukrainsk, Krasnoarmeysk Municipal District, men born in 1963, 1968 and 1979 received moderate injuries as a result of enemy use of cannon artillery. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramBelarusian security officer 🇧🇾This is what I wrote about in the morning. The Armed Forces of Ukraine found themselves in an operational encirclement in the villages south of Kurakhovo due to the breakthrough of Russian forces to the village of Dalneye. In the Ukrainian segment of the TG, the issue of the official withdrawal of Ukrainian forces from this -pocket- is already being actively raised.@belarusian_silovik

Title: 🔁 📌 WHAT PLATFORMS IS THE @RYBAR PROJECT AVAILABLE ON? You know...
Description: Forwarded From Rybar📌 WHAT PLATFORMS IS THE @RYBAR PROJECT AVAILABLE ON? You know, after the announcement of an award for us by the US State Department and the US Department of Justice, there has been an influx of new audience on our channel. The most popular question: where else can you read Rybar, if something happens?▪️Considering that Rybar is blocked in the territory of so-called Ukraine and European countries, this can only be treated by using an account from another country. You can always go to a service like sms-activate and for a nominal 30-50 rubles buy a foreign account from some Burundi for Telegram. Just don’t forget to set up two-factor authentication - and read Rybar.▪️Don’t like Telegram? All content from the main channel is available on our VK page. There are enough nuances there, VK doesn’t really like military content, there is also pessimization of traffic, but you can read it as a backup platform.▪️We duplicate all our informative posts on our website rybar.ru: our articles are available there.▪️Since we still broadcast on TV, then the head of the @rybar project, Mikhail Zvinchuk, speaks on air all our important materials. All this is posted on Rutube. Moreover, some broadcasts appear there even earlier than on our channel. Therefore, you need to subscribe there.▪️For our English-speaking readers, there is a telegram channel Rybar in English (where we post English versions of broadcasts, among other things), which automatically translates our posts. In addition, the channels @rybarFR, @rybaresp and @rybarital work for our French, Spanish and Italian readers.▪️An easier and more accessible format of the Rybar is our flood room NERYBAR. All members of our team write there, it’s a club of interests. And on Fridays, Rybar’s management answers subscribers’ questions in a video circle format in the chat. Your @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovskoe direction: successes of the Russian Ar...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: successes of the Russian Armed Forces near KurakhovoSituation towards the end of November 12, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue offensive operations in several areas.🔻Judging by the footage appearing on the network, a clean-up operation is underway in Ilyinka. A significant part of the settlement is already under the control of Russian troops, and previously published a photo of Russian Armed Forces soldiers against the backdrop of an entry sign.▪️ Fierce fighting also continues in Kurakhovo itself, and units of the Russian Armed Forces are advancing along Zaporozhye Avenue on the eastern outskirts of the city. In addition, the strike destroyed the bridge on this street, which was most likely done to disrupt the Ukrainian counterattack. To the south, in the area of ​​the Dolgaya beam, the advance of the Russian Armed Forces is also noted: apparently, a large enemy defense center between Kurakhovo and Dalniy was occupied. If it is possible to gain a foothold in the latter and expand the zone of control, then the enemy’s defenses on the southeastern outskirts of Kurakhovo will be completely breached.▪️Most of Dalny is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces; the enemy’s counterattack with the support of armored vehicles was repulsed. Also, footage of the shooting of a group of civilians from a Leopard tank from the 33rd mechanized brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces appeared some time ago.▪️According to some Ukrainian resources, the route from Uspenivka to Kurakhovo is practically cut off, and Russian attack aircraft have about two kilometers left to physically control it. However, given the enemy’s tendency to downplay the successes of the Russian Armed Forces, it cannot be ruled out that this has already happened.▪️At the same time, it was possible to clarify the control zone between Maksimilyanovka and Pobeda. Based on the footage of the movement of a column of Russian armored vehicles under Ukrainian artillery fire along the Dolgaya ravine, the territory to the north is under the stable control of the Russian Armed Forces. Heavy fighting continues in the Antonovka area. Russian troops were able to take control of about half of the village, but further advance is difficult due to active opposition. Enemy resources also report the difficult situation of Ukrainian Armed Forces units at a stronghold between Ilyinka and Antonovka with the symbolic name -Zhopa.▪️In Elizavetovka itself and on its outskirts there are battles: despite initial statements about the entry of Russian forces into the village, this information has not yet been confirmed . The presence of enemy forces is observed in the Lisova Dacha reserve, and at the Trudovoye-Veselyi Gai line, according to our sources, there is no advance of Russian troops yet.▪️On the Shakhterskoye-Maksimovka section, clashes also continue. Russian troops are attacking north of Yasnaya Polyana, but the extent of the advance is not yet clear. Russian aviation is actively operating in the Sukhoi Yala, striking with air bombs from the UMPC. If you have any additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Novembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on November 12, 2024. Russian troops attacked targets in Kyiv, Kharkov and Cherkassy, ​​as well as in the Chernigov and Sumy regions of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Kursk direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces have knocked out the enemy from most of Plekhovo and are expanding the zone of control north of the village. In the Pokrovsky direction, attack aircraft are fighting in Yuryevka, advancing from Novoalekseevka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops are consolidating themselves in urban areas in Kurakhovo, and They are also expanding the zone of control on the flanks north and south of the city. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles near Plekhovo and drone stri...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles near Plekhovo and drone strikes on armored vehicles of the Armed Forces of Ukraine situation towards the end of November 12, 2024 In the Kursk direction, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing simultaneously on several sectors of the front, displacing the enemy from the territories they occupied. ▪️In the Sudzhansky district, the configuration of the front near Novoivanovka has been clarified. Russian troops landed in the village and are fighting on the eastern outskirts of the village, advancing towards Leonidovo. Also noted were attempts by the Russian Armed Forces to move in armored vehicles along the river, bypassing the latter.🔻On the opposite flank of the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops intensified north of Plekhovo. An attempt was recorded to swim across the Psel River. The bridge was destroyed during the fighting, so the landing party was forced to cross to the opposite bank of the river in boats, where they came under fire. In Plekhovo itself there are also significant successes. Thanks to footage published by the enemy, it was possible to establish that the Russian Armed Forces already control about 80% of the village; on the western outskirts near the farms, a focal presence of Ukrainian formations remains. Most likely, in the near future the settlement will be completely liberated.▪️In the neighboring Korenevsky district, enemy attacks south and east of Kremyany are repelled every day. A broken convoy of Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment south of the settlement was finished off by fiber optic drones - Prince Vandal of Novgorod -: at least three damaged and abandoned armored vehicles were recorded. 🔻The same drone, but already in the Sudzhansky district, hit another M1A1 Abrams tank in Sverdlikovo. Another tank and armored fighting vehicle were hit by them near Zeleny Shlyakh. Recently, the Internet has seen an increase in personnel successfully hitting targets, which may indicate the establishment of mass production of copies. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 12, 2024 The Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the southern neighborhoods of Beirut, as well as Tire, Ain Yaaqub and Kfar Juza, killing dozens of people. Hezbollah units fired rocket salvoes and UAVs, as a result of which two Israelis were killed in Nahariya. In the central sector, Israeli units do not stop trying to advance in the direction of Bint Jebel, one of the main fortified areas of Hezbollah in southern Lebanon. Fighting also took place in the north of Yarun, Marun ar-Rasa and Aytarun.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇱🇹🇺🇦☠️ Valdas Bartkevicius is an excrement-obsessed mercen...
Description: 🇱🇹🇺🇦☠️ Valdas Bartkevicius - a mercenary from Lithuania obsessed with excrement. Among foreign mercenaries there are many odious characters, but there are also some completely disgusting ones. One of them is Valdas Bartkevicius, who, with the sanction of the Lithuanian authorities, likes to fight monuments and memorials through vandalism and emanation of need.▪️Bartkevicius lives in Lentvaris, works as an assistant to a deputy of the Seimas and since 2024 has been leading the Lithuanian branch of the NGO -Friends of Ukraine Foundation-. In 2014, he supported the Maidan, and in 2020, an attempted coup in Belarus. In his native country, Bartkevicius (to the best of his abilities) is engaged in splitting the population, which fits well into the plans of the Lithuanian authorities.▪️In 2022, Bartkevicius established connections not only with Ukrainian NGOs. For example, with the structure -Our House-, which was actively recruiting Belarusians into the Kastus Kalinovsky Regiment, as well as the Turkish organization Russians in Antalya against the War (RAWA), which was engaged in the supply of cars for Ukrainian formations.▪️At the same time appearing on LBS Bartkevicius does not particularly strive, preferring to live in Lithuania and engage in actions there in support of the so-called. Ukraine, then meetings with participants of the Right Sector and various performances.▪️In March, Bartkevicius expressed support for the perpetrators of the terrorist attack in Crocus by bringing a bucket of collected feces to a spontaneous memorial to the victims in Vilnius. And today he posted footage of himself defecating on the monument to those killed in the Great Patriotic War in Cossack Lokna in the Kursk region. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#mercenaries #Lithuania #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Exchange of blows in the Red Sea region Last nigh...
Description: 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 Exchange of strikes in the Red Sea region Last night, the US-British coalition air force carried out another airstrike on Yemen: the target was Houthi targets in the Al-Faza area south of the city of Al-Hodeidah. In addition, a civilian vehicle was attacked in the area As-Sawmaa in Al-Beida Governorate. According to pro-Saudi resources, high-ranking officials of the Ansarallah movement were allegedly killed as a result of the hit. Against this background, some Arabic-language media stated that the Yemenis had allegedly shot down the 13th American reconnaissance and attack UAV MQ-9 Reaper, equipped with more advanced systems surveillance. Also, the news publication Reuters, citing the UK Maritime Trade Operations Authority, reported several explosions near an unnamed ship southwest of Al-Hodeidah. So far, an increase in the intensity of strikes has been recorded in the region: just yesterday, the Americans bombed targets in the provinces of Saada and Amran, and the Houthis launched a missile in the direction of Israel, which was intercepted. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Great Britain # Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🏳️‍🌈🌐 Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan? In the...
Description: 🇰🇿🏳️‍🌈🌐 Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan? In the Kazakh media, the discussion of the topic of minority protection is entering a new circle, which intensified after the partial satisfaction of the petition - We are against open and hidden LGBT propaganda in the Republic of Kazakhstan! -, as well as the recent parliamentary request of the ruling AMANAT party activities of the queer feminist collective - Feminita - addressed to the Prime Minister and the Prosecutor General of the country. To introduce restrictions on the dissemination of sexualized content among children, the Ministry of Culture of the Republic of Kazakhstan had to turn to all the laws of the Republic - from the Constitution to the Act on the Rights of the Child, according to which government agencies, individuals and legal entities are obliged to protect the child from the negative impact of the social environment, information , propaganda and agitation -. However, the decision began to be challenged by the Kazakhstan International Bureau for Human Rights and Rule of Law and Human Rights Watch, which are funded by the Soros Foundation. So the victorious reports of the local press and hopes for the defeat of LGBT are premature: the protection of the rights of minorities in Kazakhstan is carried out by serious, well-rooted organizations with impressive funding.🔻For more information about who, under the guise of LGBT, is promoting the traditions of bacha-bazi in Kazakhstan, read our new article .High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Kazakhstan #LGBT #globalismProject -Rybar-Will LGBT propaganda be banned in Kazakhstan* It all started in the summer, when it suddenly became clear that there is a civil society in Kazakhstan

Title: 🖼 🇦🇺🇸🇬 About Exercise Trident 2024 The Australian Armed Forc...
Description: 🇦🇺🇸🇬 About Exercise Trident 2024 The Australian Armed Forces continue to conduct bilateral international exercises. In addition to ongoing training with the Indonesians, they have also started the Trident 2024 event with Singaporean military personnel. About two thousand troops are involved in the exercise. The parties plan to practice landing personnel on the coast of Queensland, as well as conduct two operations in urban areas and the jungle. IAI Heron-1 reconnaissance UAVs will also be used. By the way, conducting such training in Australia is due to a specific reason - in tiny Singapore there is simply not enough space for such events, which is why they have historically resorted to the services of Taiwan and other allied states. 📌 This is precisely why the Singaporean authorities made a deal with the Australians to modernize a training site in Queensland worth a billion dollars. In return, military personnel from Singapore will be able to use the facility once construction work is completed. Given that one of Singapore's policy priorities is to build up its military power, the opportunity to conduct training in Australia is of utmost importance. So the scale and complexity of exercises like Trident 2024 will only grow in the future. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #Singapore@rybar in collaboration with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺💰 And again about measures to support Russian business While...
Description: 🇷🇺💰 And again about measures to support Russian business While the European Union is preparing the 15th package of sanctions against the Russian Federation, we decided to look at the news about how our state supports companies and markets not related to the defense industry and strategic industry (the priorities here are already clear). And with a quick search we see the news: the company Geltek, a manufacturer of skincare cosmetics with scientifically proven effectiveness, has received the official status of a small technology company (MTK). Surely many, like us, are hearing about the so-called MTC register for the first time. However, for most companies from the civil sector, getting there becomes a truly important achievement, primarily due to access to benefits and receiving a quality mark from the state, which, in in turn, attracts private investors. At the same time, everyone who wants to be included in the register remains required to meet a sufficient level of scientific and technical potential when developing products. And it is no coincidence that we gave the example of Geltek, because it demonstrates that state support measures are expanding not only to the IT sector, but also to other areas Russian business, and not the most obvious for the general consumer (in this case we are talking not only about cosmetics, but also about the supply of contact media for ultrasound and functional diagnostics).📌 In any case, please note attention to these processes is possible and necessary. So that against the backdrop of news about the latest sanctions against LNG or government decisions to introduce benefits for IT workers, the false impression is not formed that everything that happens only concerns them. #Russia #economy@rybarSupport usTelegramGeltek behind the glassSergey Kirsh: thanks to the medical direction of Geltek, they recently received the status of MTK - small technology company. That is, not only IT can be a technology company, but manufacturing - hurray! Why do we need this? This is an opportunity to receive address…

Title: 🇷🇺🇯🇵 About the -mitigation- of anti-Russian sanctions by Japa...
Description: 🇷🇺🇯🇵 About Japan's -softening- of anti-Russian sanctions. Yesterday, news spread across the Russian-language segment of the Internet that Tokyo allegedly decided to lift some of the sanctions regarding the export of Japanese-made cars to Russia. There were even headlines about the official return of Nissan, Toyota and Mitsubishi to the country. In reality, we are only talking about clarifying the wording in the restrictions regarding some models of hybrid cars. There was no ban on their sale to Russia anyway, but due to ambiguous definitions, Japanese companies did not agree to this for fear of violating sanctions. Perhaps Japan was guided by purely economic considerations: its automakers are suffering serious losses and are trying to find any way to obtain profit. Including due to part of the Russian market, where the niche of departed European and Asian concerns was quickly occupied by companies from the PRC. Therefore, there is no talk of easing sanctions at the moment, and linking this step with Trump’s victory in the election or other similar events are not worth it. Yes, the scenario of lifting the most serious Western restrictions in the current realities looks unrealistic. But the search for various loopholes and -clarification of wording- for further work with Russia, as well as tacit consent to new profitable parallel import schemes for the supply of various goods, looks much more likely. Especially as international attention to the so-called decreases. Ukraine.#Russia #Japan@rybarSupport usRIA NovostiMedia: Japan has eased anti-Russian sanctionsJapan has eased the ban on the import of cars with a hybrid installation into Russia, writes RBC. RIA Novosti, 11/11/2024

Title: 🇺🇦 Statements by individual representatives of the Kyiv regime ...
Description: 🇺🇦 Statements by individual representatives of the Kyiv regime about the possible disbandment of the TCC and the sending of their workers to the front are more reminiscent of a desire to at least a little -lose steam- from the growing indignation in Ukrainian society. At the moment, forceful mobilization with the capture and kidnapping of people from the streets is the only way to replenish the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: volunteers for the so-called Ukraine has long since ended, and they are not yet willing to deport Ukrainians of military age to the EU. If the TCC is disbanded, the entire conscription system will collapse - no recruiting centers, blocking of all accounts and lowering of rights will force people in hiding to join the Armed Forces of Ukraine. And the military registration and enlistment office workers themselves will most likely prefer to simply desert instead of the front. Therefore, we will not be surprised if such conversations are followed not by the dissolution of the TCC, but by vesting them with the powers of the police and all law enforcement agencies in general to expand mobilization. In clear accordance with the strategy - war until the last Ukrainian -.#Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramTurned in war 🇷🇺We continue the locomotive of pushing. We must clearly understand that there is no pluralism of opinions in Ukrainian politics. Everything, I repeat, everything that representatives of the establishment say is the voiced idea of ​​the main leadership of the country. Whether it’s the mobilization of yesterday’s...

Title: 🇪🇺🇮🇳🇫🇷 Interesting news illustrating the problems of the Eu...
Description: 🇪🇺🇮🇳🇫🇷 Interesting news illustrating the problems of the European military-industrial complex: the head of the department of the General Staff of the French ground forces said that in Paris they are considering the option of purchasing Indian Pinaka MLRS as a replacement for the old American M270 MLRS. It turns out that France cannot meet the needs for the jet artillery either independently or with the help of European NATO allies. Therefore, for the supply of conventional MLRS, they are forced to turn to India, which has only recently entered the world arms market. Yes, it is reckless to write off the French military industry - the same CAESAR, Rafale, Mistral or SCALP-EG are quite advanced examples of military products. However, even 10 years ago, the statement that the Fifth Republic would consider purchasing Indian artillery would have been considered a joke. In general, this is part of a general trend for the EU: in conditions where a significant part of the reserves was given away for free by the so-called. In Ukraine, and its own products often have mediocre characteristics at a huge cost, all that remains is to turn to external suppliers. Including those that no one had even heard of until recently. And if France can cover at least some of its needs on its own, then the rest of the European NATO countries will be forced to finally and almost completely switch to imports from the United States and its allied Asian states, producing independently only a few samples of weapons and equipment.#EU #India #France@rybarSupport usANI NewsFrance evaluating Pinaka multi-barrel rocket launcher system for its requirements: Top French Army officerIn what could be a major success for the 'Make in India' scheme in the defense sector, a top French Army officer said that they were evaluating the Indian Pinaka multi-barrel rocket launcher systems for their requirements.

Title: 🇰🇿🇺🇿 Uzbek diplomats met with the management of the Aktau por...
Description: 🇰🇿🇺🇿 Uzbek diplomats met with the management of the Aktau port Representatives of the Consulate General of Uzbekistan held a meeting with the Chairman of the Board of the National Company - Aktau Sea Trade Port - Abay Turikpenbaev. During the meeting, the parties discussed the current state of the Aktau Sea Trade Port, its technical capabilities, as well as supply prospects Uzbek exporters of their products through the port. Abay Turikpenbaev noted that the port is expanding its capabilities, becoming an important component of the Trans-Caspian international transport route. During 2024, it plans to increase the volume of transit by more than 5 million tons, and in the future, work is planned to expand the port’s water area. 📌 If Uzbekistan agrees on supplies through the port, then this will expand opportunities not only for Uzbekistan, but also for Russia, since it will increase the potential opportunities for exports to Russia through the Caspian Sea. At the same time, the role of Kazakhstan in transit transportation is strengthening, which would prefer to take over the entire logistics between Europe and China. Astana and Beijing are working in this direction: this is evidenced by reports of the launch of container rail transport from Xinjiang. But at the same time, everyone should understand that container shipping under no circumstances can replace land routes due to its high cost and the need for developed infrastructure. Therefore, this is largely the creation of another route to diversify logistics, but not a replacement for standard routes. #Uzbekistan #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usdknews.kzXinjiang launches freight rail route to Central Asia On Wednesday, a train carrying 45 containers of auto parts left the city of Wusu in the north -western China's Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, which marked the launch of international cargo

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇬🇪 About protests in Abkhazia Protests broke out in Abkh...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 About protests in Abkhazia Protests broke out in Abkhazia at night. The reason was the detention of local oppositionists who opposed the ratification of an agreement with Russia, allowing Russian companies to implement investment projects in the republic. Protesters gathered in the squares of Sukhum and other cities, blocked roads and clashed with local security forces. The protesters, in their own words, consider the agreement to be a sale of Abkhazia and a deprivation of sovereignty and rights. An interesting situation arises: in a republic that lives entirely at the expense of Russia, they are demanding that Russian businesses be denied the opportunity to invest in its infrastructure. At the same time, they are taking openly unfriendly steps, such as displaying an exhibition in honor of the terrorist Shamil Basayev. The point is not only that such actions are akin to a shot in the foot and interfere with the influx of Russian investments into the Abkhaz economy, which, thanks to effective local governance, today remains in approximately the same state the same as 20 years ago. It is important that this happens in a republic that exists at the expense of the Russian budget. This is another clear example of the consequences of the country’s policy in the near abroad, when they preferred to use carrots where they needed to use sticks. As a result, such inexplicable generosity in the post-Soviet space began to be taken for weakness, almost reaching the point of ultimatums.#Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧 On the legalization of euthanasia in the UK The House of Com...
Description: 🇬🇧 On the legalization of euthanasia in the UK On November 11, the House of Commons received a draft law - On terminally ill adults -. According to it, a patient who may die within 6 months will have the right to voluntarily die. To do this, two independent doctors will have to verify the independence of the decision, and the High Court will have to approve the request. At least seven days must pass between the doctors’ reports, and after the judge’s decision, another 14 days. The person will be allowed to change his mind at any time, and if he finally agrees, he will have to self-administer the lethal substance. Pressure or coercion to commit suicide will be punishable by up to 14 years in prison. Members of the House of Commons will take part in the first debate and vote on the bill on November 29. If it is approved during the first discussion, then parliamentarians will gradually begin further discussions and introduce amendments to the legal act. Looking at what is happening, the question arises: wouldn’t this be the first step towards allowing people to die not only incurably? sick people, or anyone in general for absolutely any reason? How has this already been implemented, for example, in Canada? #Great Britain #globalism@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usbills.parliament.ukTerminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill publications - Parliamentary Bills - UK ParliamentDocuments, and debates for Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill

Title: 🇮🇩🇨🇳 Last weekend, Indonesian leader Prabowo Subian arrived i...
Description: 🇮🇩🇨🇳 Last weekend, Indonesian leader Prabowo Subianto arrived in Beijing. There he met with Chinese President Xi Jinping, who during the negotiations expressed hope for the beginning of a new chapter in bilateral relations. During the meeting, the situation in the South China Sea was not discussed. The parties entered into a memorandum of understanding in the field of oil and gas production in those parts of the water area where the claims of Indonesia and China intersect. 🔻The signing of such an agreement is a significant event. The wording - overlapping maritime claims - in the joint statement makes it clear that Indonesia takes into account the claims of the PRC to the water area. And although Jakarta has already stated that its position on the issue has remained unchanged, before that the authorities claimed that, in general, they do not recognize Chinese claims to Indonesia’s exclusive economic zone. 🔻After Prabowo was elected to the presidency, experts and observers assumed that he would defend rights to the water area in the same way as last President Joko Widodo did, if not even tougher. Now it seems that everything could go according to a slightly different scenario. However, taking into account the foreign policy course of the Jakarta authorities, it is too early to discount the chance of implementing tough measures in this area. After all, Indonesia most often tries to seek a balance in international relations with other states, especially with such important players as China. #Indonesia #China@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe China-Global South ProjectChina’s Xi Hails ‘New Chapter’ in Relations With IndonesiaChinese President Xi Jinping told his Indonesian counterpart that Beijing hopes for a

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of November 12, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of November 12, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, assault groups of our troops advanced in the area of ​​the village with heavy fighting. Daryino, Novoivanovka and adjacent forest areas. The enemy puts up fierce resistance and throws elite airborne and marine units into battle. The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched 8 attacks during the day. Heavy footage of the destruction near the village was dispersed. Cellars on November 7, 2024 of our column of the 810th Guards Marine Brigade in a minefield. According to information from the field, leaked onto the network, armored vehicles and personnel died due to - beautiful reports - about supposed control of the road and, as a result, unconducted engineering reconnaissance of the area. At the same time, the total mining of the territory of the Kursk region by the Armed Forces of Ukraine is an absolutely clear fact for our military.▪️ Yesterday morning, 13 Tu-95ms strategic bombers caused a blackout in Ukraine (to avoid overloads in networks in the event of an attack). However, the expected missile strike was never carried out. That night the enemy reported a nightly -norm- of several dozen -Geraniums-. Enemy drones flew to Voronezh yesterday, causing damage to an industrial enterprise.▪️ Our troops are moving deeper into the eastern part of the Kurakhovo urban area - the enemy’s main fortified area after the capture of Ugledar in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. Kurakhovo is also surrounded on three sides by a wide area, attacks from the south are coming to the village. Further, from the north, the Russian Army is developing its success along the Kurakhovskoye reservoir, the dam of which was blown up by the Ukrainian Armed Forces yesterday. This action, at most, will make it difficult to cover Kurakhovo from the north.▪️ The troops of the Zaporozhye Front of the Russian Armed Forces, according to the estimates of the speaker of the enemy’s southern defense forces, are planning to begin assault operations in the coming days. At the same time, the enemy declares that in the Zaporozhye direction our troops numerically exceed the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The main target of the strike, as reported by the enemy, is the city of Zaporozhye with a pre-war population of 710 thousand people.▪️ Also indicative was the visit of Russian Defense Minister Belousov to the Dnepr group of troops (Kherson direction). Inspection may also indicate an assessment of the situation on the ground before making decisions.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Ukrainian Armed Forces used a drone to attack an oil depot on the territory of the Stary Oskol urban district. As a result of the explosion, one of the tanks caught fire. Ten fire brigades worked at the scene and quickly extinguished the fire. There were no casualties. In a closed village, a man was blown up by an explosive device. The emergency occurred in the village of Dronovka, Grayvoronsky district, entry into which is limited by the decision of the operational headquarters from August 28, 2024. Strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces also fell on Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, settlement. New Tavolzhanka in the Shebekinsky municipal district, Balka farm. Palace in the DPR in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when resetting an IVU with UPS BPU US, a man and a woman made up: two marioratlegram -cyril Fedorov / War History of Weapons 🇷🇺 Undeemed Khokhly's days of an unsuccessful occurrence fighters of the Russian army in the Kursk region near the village of Pogrebki. Several lightly armored BTR-82A with troops on board tried to break through a minefield laid by the enemy.…

Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇩🇪🇷🇺🇺🇦 Everyone today is discussing the Telegraph article about the plans of the British Prime Minister and the French President to persuade Biden, before leaving the American political Olympus, to give the green light to the use of long-range missiles against Russia. But the main thing here is not to forget about one more thing, not completely independent ruler - Olaf Scholze, whose country also actively continues to supply the Armed Forces of Ukraine for the further development of the conflict no matter what.♦️For example, now at the Starichi training ground in the Lviv region, preparation and combat coordination of the 5th separate tank brigade is underway - a formation that began to be formed back in 2022, and it was supposed to lead the 2023 offensive with Abrams and Challenger tanks. But then that offensive of the Ukrainian Armed Forces happened, which ended in major losses and the brigade was never put into operation, and the equipment was scattered among other units. But finally, the 5th brigade is almost ready - at the end of December they intend to transfer it to the Kurakhovsky direction. What is interesting here is that it now includes several tank battalions, and each of them has been allocated 10 Leopard 2 tanks. If we assume that in a standard brigade from 2 to 4 battalions, we get from 20 to 40 units of German tanks. Well, plans to transfer them to Kurakhovo indicate that the enemy still does not intend to just surrender these territories, since he is ready to throw a newly formed elite brigade into battle only from the training ground. #Germany #Russia #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelTwo Majors🇩🇪GermanyStill German Chancellor Olaf Scholz in an interview with ARD: Scholz: -Yes, I’m going to talk with the Russian president- Journalist: -when will the right time come?-Scholz: -Soon- .✨The worthless puppet of the United States, sponsoring the war in Ukraine, brought...

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end on November 11, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Russian troops continue to liberate the enemy-occupied territories of the region from occupation.▪️In the Sudzhansky region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine tried to attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in the Novoivanovka and Nikolaevo-Daryino areas , however, not only did they not achieve success, but and lost control of part of Daryino and the area to the north. Objective monitoring footage confirms the advance of Russian fighters clearing basements and positions in dilapidated houses. In the Pogrebki area, it was possible to clarify the configuration of the front line. Considering the recent movement of armored vehicles of the Russian Armed Forces along the road in the direction of Malaya Loknya, the entire territory east of Maryevka is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. ▪️In the neighboring Korenevsky district, another attack by an armored group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine east of Kremyany was repelled. It was also possible to determine that the section of the front near the Verkhnyaya Bloshka ravine and the Verkhny Shpil tract is occupied by Russian troops, who during the clashes captured several units of enemy equipment. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for November 11, 2024 Israeli aircraft again attacked the border and rear settlements of Lebanon. One of the hits was on Nabatiyeh, which was gradually turning into ruins, where another mosque was destroyed. Hezbollah fighters launched about 200 rockets at northern Israel. As a result of the attacks, buildings in several settlements were damaged and one woman was injured. There are no significant changes along the border itself: the parties exchange blows and undertake virtually no offensive activity in any of the areas. At the same time, reports appeared in the media about the Israelis’ intention to expand the ground operation. Also, the Israeli Air Force again attacked the territory of Syria, where the target was a humanitarian convoy going to Lebanon. It also hit populated areas through which the transport corridor between the countries passes. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strike by the Russian Armed Forces on an ammunition d...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Strike by the Russian Armed Forces on an ammunition depot in Cherevkovka Yesterday morning, November 10, Russian troops launched a missile strike on the Cherevkovka district in the south-eastern part of Slavyansk. The target was an ammunition depot at the old airfield, located on the very outskirts of the city. As a result of several arrivals, explosions occurred on the territory of the facility, and secondary detonations were observed. According to local residents, after the hit, the spontaneous dispersion of the stored missiles was visible. At the same time, in Slavyansk, as well as Kramatorsk and other cities of the agglomeration, there are several large enterprises, which are also used for storing ammunition and parking equipment. From time to time they become targets of attacks by the Russian Armed Forces. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Donetsk #Russia #Slavyansk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺⚙️✈️ Today, the United Aircraft Corporation (UAC) announced the transfer to the troops of the next batch of Su-35S multirole fighters, as well as fifth-generation Su-57 fighters. The exact number of aircraft is not disclosed for obvious reasons. At the same time, previous deliveries of aircraft of this type took place in mid-September, and the UAC also clarified that this is not the last batch this year. It is unnecessary to talk about the importance of combat aviation during the Northern Military District, especially if we are talking about the well-proven Su-35S, which three years have repeatedly demonstrated their capabilities. Therefore, the appearance of new aircraft in the Aerospace Forces cannot but rejoice. And even though fighters and bombers are not yet shipped monthly in batches of dozens of aircraft, the industry is doing everything possible to increase production. And even the Su-57 in the army is no longer quite a one-off machine. #aviation #industry #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The blowing up of the Kurakhovskoe reservoir dam is b...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the undermining of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir dam There is a heated discussion on the Internet about the undermining of the Kurakhovskoye reservoir dam with a volume of 62 million cubic meters by Ukrainian formations. Judging by the publications, the Ukrainian Armed Forces damaged the locks in the Starye Tern area: this led to the overflow of the Volchya River, which flows in a westerly direction. At the moment, the Ukrainian authorities are announcing a slight increase in the water level in the river. Stary Terny and Shevchenko, located close to the shore, are at risk. Footage from the enemy has already appeared on the Internet, demonstrating difficulties with the passage of vehicles. The probable flooding zone will stretch for tens of kilometers west of Kurakhovo up to the village of Bogatyr. All settlements are located in lowlands, so the water is unlikely to go beyond the boundaries of residential buildings.🔻 Although the enemy was clearly guided by the intentions of slowing down the developing offensive of the Russian Armed Forces, the effectiveness of such measures is questionable. Taking into account the current configuration of the front line, by the time the main troops of the Russian Armed Forces approach Starye Terny, the water level will most likely have already begun to decline. Of course, Ukrainian resources, in their characteristic manner, blamed the incident on -Russian shelling-, but artillery shell hits are unlikely to cause any serious damage to the dam. In contrast to charges placed in advance in the right places.📌 By the way, this is not the first such action carried out by the Ukrainian Armed Forces: in addition to the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station dam, the enemy had previously destroyed dams near Kozarovichi, Bakhmut, Avdeevka and other locations during the retreat. Moreover, in some cases, such scorched earth tactics also led to the fact that Ukrainian units ended up in the flood zone. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us at feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#Donetsk #Kurakhovo #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🌍🇵🇰 About joint exercises of the Armed Forces of Pakistan a...
Description: 🌍🇵🇰 About joint exercises of the Armed Forces of Pakistan and African countries In recent years, one can observe how regional players are showing increasing interest in the Dark Continent. These include Pakistan: within a month, the country’s armed forces conducted two exercises with African states, which were not involved in similar joint events in Islamabad. ▪️At the beginning of October, exercises -Iqbal-1- took place, where military personnel from South Africa were involved for the first time. This year, counter-terrorism training took place in Cherat, Pakistan, but next year it will take place on South African territory. ▪️Another Passage Exercise took place in Djibouti during the visit of the Pakistani Navy ship Zulfiquar to the port of the African country. The visit was aimed at strengthening cooperation in the naval sphere, and military attaches and ambassadors were also present on board. Such small steps are part of Pakistan's strategy adopted back in 2019 to strengthen its influence in Africa. It is largely due to the opposition of India, which itself is making great efforts to gain a foothold on the continent. In this example, one can once again notice how Africa is becoming a -second front- for the confrontation of not only global, but also regional geopolitical opponents of various stripes. Map in high view permissionEnglish version#Africa #Djibouti #Pakistan #South Africa@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Another IDF strike on Syria A few hours ago, Israeli ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Another IDF strike on Syria A few hours ago, Israeli aircraft again launched strikes on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic bordering Lebanon. This time the target of the raid was the section of the highway between Damascus and Homs. ▪️According to Syrian sources, the hit was on a convoy with humanitarian aid for Lebanese residents in the vicinity of Shamsein, located in the countryside south of Homs. ▪️As a result of the attack, three people were injured, and a large column of smoke appeared at the arrival site. Traffic along the section of the highway was temporarily restricted under the pretext of ensuring the safety of citizens.▪️Israeli media claim that the target of the raid was a convoy with ammunition for Hezbollah. They either did not acknowledge the hit on humanitarian supplies at all, or commented in the context of the fact that they allegedly planned to send weapons to Lebanon along with them. In the morning, there were also reports of Israeli Air Force strikes on the border settlements of Al-Qasr and Khosh al-Seyyid Ali. Almost any attack on them is justified in a similar way, since the transport corridor from Syria to Lebanon passes through them. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Syria #Homs@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: attack on Kurakhovo from three...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: attack on Kurakhovo from three flanks situation as of 17:00 November 11, 2024 In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops continue their offensive from several directions, systematically approaching the liberation of Kurakhovo.▪️On the northern flank, according to the most optimistic estimates, Russian troops took Voznesenka, Novoselidovka and Ilyinka, and also went to Berestki. At the same time, there are no objective control shots that could confirm the breakthrough. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces made significant progress in the fields near Novoalekseevka and broke into Sontsevka, the homeland of the Russian composer Sergei Prokofiev. There are battles in a populated area not far from the museum, which the Ukrainian Armed Forces are shelling from tanks. ▪️On the eastern flank, Russian troops are advancing on Kurakhovo from Maksimovka, the fighting has shifted to the outskirts of the city. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces carried out an attack in the area of ​​the Dolgaya gully in the direction of Dalniy, bypassing the main defensive fortifications of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Footage of the work of a tank crew of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in a forest belt less than a kilometer from the settlement was published on the Internet. Thus, within a week, it was possible to advance more than five kilometers in this area, creating a threat of enveloping Kurakhovo.▪️In the south, Russian units advanced north and east of Bogoyavlenka, knocking the enemy out of the forest belts, and continued their attack on Vesely Gai. At the moment, information about the liberation of the RF Armed Forces of Trudovoy with the subsequent assault on Uspenivka is premature and does not correspond to reality. In the Maksimovka area, Russian troops, according to preliminary data, destroyed a special forces group of the 10th Special Forces Regiment GUR from the company -Honey Eater-, and also hit two armored vehicles -Kazak- and BMP. According to other sources, the Honey Badger group of the 169th training center -Desna- came under fire. In addition, there are reports of advanced groups entering deep into Elizavetovka, but they have not yet been confirmed either by objective control personnel or sources from the field. On the western outskirts of Antonovka, the presence of a small number of enemy forces remains. At the same time, messages about the alleged blowing up of the Kurakhovskoye Reservoir dam began to spread on the Internet. However, so far they have not been confirmed either by information from the field or by objective control footage - today they tried to present as the latter a photo of the Kozarovych dam in the Kyiv region, destroyed in 2022 by Ukrainian forces. Title: 🖼 🇾🇪🇮🇱 About the Houthi missile strike on Israel This mornin...
Description: 🇾🇪🇮🇱 About the Houthi missile attack on Israel This morning, detachments of the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - again attacked Israeli territory. This time the fired missile reached the central part of the country, where it was intercepted near the small settlement of Beit Shemesh. A fire broke out at the site where the ammunition fragments fell. Although Arabic-language media reported that a huge fire had allegedly broken out, in reality the fire was extinguished by local fire brigades within a few hours. 📌 At the same time, not far from Beit Shemesh there is the Sdot Micha airbase: according to some data, aircraft missiles, including those with nuclear warheads, are stored at the facility. Officially, Israel denies the presence of nuclear weapons, but this has long been an open secret. According to Houthi speaker Yahya Sari, during the attack Ansarallah used a hypersonic ballistic missile Palestine-2. This is not the first time it has been used against Israel - back in September, ammunition of this type crashed in an open area near the settlement of Kfar Daniel.🔻Meanwhile, at night a series of strikes were also carried out on Yemen itself: this time the aircraft of the American-British coalition worked on the outskirts of a large the city of Saada, as well as several settlements in the province of Amran. Apparently, the target of the raid was again Houthi launchers and weapons depots, which were used, among other things, to attack civilian ships in the Red Sea region. It is characteristic that the last recorded such attack was at the end of September. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Yemen #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇩🇪🇪🇺 A delegation of Moldovan officials and deputies visi...
Description: 🇲🇩🇩🇪🇪🇺 A delegation of Moldovan officials and deputies visited Germany for consultations on a potential law on lobbying activities. The visit was organized with the support of the German Foundation for International Legal Cooperation (IRZ), which works to change the legal and judicial systems in other countries. The adoption of the Lobbying Law is one of the requirements for candidates for EU membership. Recently he was officially accepted into the so-called. Ukraine, which has already been plundered as part of promoting the interests of Western business. In the case of Moldova, the act will be a logical step towards destroying the sovereignty of the republic, but in a legal way. After all, lobbying will work only in the interests of EU business, and not the Moldovans themselves. Just recently, a scandal broke out in the country about the future sale of Moldovan lands to foreigners, which will definitely be demanded in Brussels in the event of European integration. Moreover, about 75% of the territory of Moldova is fertile black soil.📌 So the lifting of the ban on the sale of national lands to foreigners is quite organically combined with the possible adoption of a law on lobbying. After the re-election of Maia Sandu and the victory of the referendum on European integration, such decisions can be made without regard to public opinion. #Germany #EU #Moldova @rybarSupport usMoldpresMoldova ar putea avea o lege privind activitatea de lobbyChişinău, 11 nov. /MOLDPRES/.
